entry.title: New release for Markopolis: v1.0.0 - API and Frontend Overhaul
entry.content:
This release includes a complete rewrite of the API and several key enhancements to improve performance, compatibility, and user experience.

Whatâ€™s New: - Improved API Response Formats: Streamlined and more consistent responses to ensure better compatibility and integration. - Fast Backlink Detection: Leveraging ripgrep for significantly faster backlink detection, improving navigation and cross-referencing within documents. - Backlink Path Fixes: Corrected handling of backlinks to support paths relative to the vault, enhancing accuracy and usability. - Enhanced Markdown Image Compatibility: Expanded support for Markdown image syntax, aligning with Obsidian-style image handling for better compatibility. - Advanced Syntax Parsing: Refined the parsing engine to better mirror Obsidian Markdown syntax, providing a smoother editing and viewing experience. - Frontend Redesign: Complete frontend rewrite optimized for rendering large Mermaid charts, ensuring seamless visualization of complex diagrams.
